BESA.Kernel.Agent.Event

Class EventBESA

  • java.lang.Object
    • BESA.Kernel.Agent.Event.ACLBESA
      • BESA.Kernel.Agent.Event.EventBESA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EventBESA
extends ACLBESA
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains the necessary information and methods for the treatment of an event BESA.
    Since:
    JDK1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
